title: Buy Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company, target price Rs 705: Chandan Taparia - Economic Times
content: Buy Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company, target price Rs 705: Chandan Taparia  Economic Times
description: Cholamandalam Investment & Finance Company Ltd., incorporated in the year 1978, is a Large Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 55473.03 Crore) operating in NBFC sector.
